typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MeterCode as string,
		Serial as string,
		PlantCode as string,
		DateTime as date 'dd/MM/yyyy',
		Quality as string,
		Stream as string,
		DataType as string,
		Energy as double '###,###,###,###.###',
		Units as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	purgeFiles: true,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> GetDataFromBlob
GetDataFromBlob aggregate(groupBy(MeterCode,
		DateTime,
		DataType),
	MedianValue = mean({Energy})
,
		MaximumValue = max({Energy})
,
		MinimumValue = min({Energy})
) ~> AggregateTheSource
